adjectives.description: laddery (comparative more laddery, superlative most laddery)

entries.meaning: Resembling or characteristic of a ladder (frame with steps for climbing).
examples: We followed the twain in breathless speed; and, not to be baulked at last after such a walk, ran rapidly down seaward by a long series of hanging terraces, communicating by short flights of abrupt laddery steps  […]
